video.title: Ingobernable
video.synopsis: The first lady of Mexico is a woman of conviction and ideals. But when she loses faith in her husband, she'll need all her strength to uncover the truth.

episodes.synopsis: A heated argument erupts between Mexico's first lady and the president over their impending divorce.
episodes.title: The Decision

episodes.synopsis: Emilia must take extreme measures to remain hidden as Mexican government forces intensify their search for her.
episodes.title: The Getaway

episodes.synopsis: The autopsy results are made public. Emilia remembers happier memories with Diego as she plans her escape from Tepito.
episodes.title: Debts Are Meant to Be Repaid

episodes.synopsis: Glimpses of Emilia and Diego's past reveal a painful truth. Emilia learns about the government's involvement in La Mosca's kidnapping.
episodes.title: The Promise

episodes.synopsis: Emilia makes a promise to the Tepito crew. The special prosecutor starts investigating the president's death.
episodes.title: The Alternative Truth

episodes.synopsis: Emilia finally watches Diego's video and thinks she knows why he was killed. The children mourn their father.
episodes.title: Cause of Death

episodes.synopsis: President Barquet wants Tomás to stop having press conferences. Emilia looks for important documents hidden by Jaime.
episodes.title: Baptism by Fire

episodes.synopsis: Canek is determined to find his kidnapped friends. Tomás comes to an agreement with Ana and Barquet.
episodes.title: Spiral Into Hell

episodes.synopsis: Emilia and the Tepito crew go on a mission to save Canek and La Mosca, and lives are lost in the process.
episodes.title: The Oath

episodes.synopsis: María is interviewed as part of the investigation. General Aguirre briefs the president on the secret black sites.
episodes.title: Vivid Memory

episodes.synopsis: Emilia and Zyan try to get General Aguirre to confess on camera. Mexico celebrates its Independence Day.
episodes.title: Declaration of Independence

episodes.synopsis: Emilia makes contact with María. General Aguirre's confession is publicized, and violent consequences ensue.
episodes.title: The Rules of the Game

episodes.synopsis: Diego's real killer is revealed. Emilia worries about Maria's safety. Lieberman is suspicious of Ana.
episodes.title: The Face of the Killer

episodes.synopsis: Emilia makes a plan to turn herself in and gets the most unlikely allies involved. Canek feels betrayed by Zyan.
episodes.title: Death Asks for Permission

episodes.synopsis: The military takes drastic measures. Emilia receives assistance from someone she'd least expect and suffers a deep betrayal.
episodes.title: For the Sake of Justice

episodes.synopsis: Emilia is tortured as her enemies band together to prompt a confession. Ana attempts to befriend multiple leaders within the government.
episodes.title: Justice on Parade

episodes.synopsis: María wakes up in a strange house and is bewildered by what she finds. Emilia's son pays her a visit. Canek connects with Ana.
episodes.title: Breaking Chains

episodes.synopsis: Gen. Almada tries to find out who the mole is that ruined his plan. Emilia's father seeks absolution. María tries to communicate with the outside world.
episodes.title: The Weight of the Crown

episodes.synopsis: Ana asks questions about who she inadvertently has been working for. Unrest continues in Tepito, with Emilia at the center. Santi recruits an army.
episodes.title: From the Ashes

episodes.synopsis: Emilia looks into her father's finances and meets someone from his past. Simon asks Ana to prove her loyalty to the mission.
episodes.title: The Light of the Past

episodes.synopsis: Ana manipulates both of the presidential candidates. Emilia and her friends target a bank in search of more answers about her father.
episodes.title: Warriors

episodes.synopsis: After new evidence of that fateful night is found, Emilia strives for peace in Mexico. But a grieving Canek has other plans.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: Ovni assumes an undercover persona and infiltrates Los Pinos to get closer to Raúl. Emiliano receives a death threat.
episodes.title: Between Two Worlds

episodes.synopsis: Emilia takes drastic measures when she and Canek head to the hospital to see their wounded family members. Ana is surprised by Ofelia.
episodes.title: Decisions

episodes.synopsis: Emilia's demands change as the hostage situation continues. Canek is tormented by his grief, and his visions of La Mosca threaten to overwhelm him.
episodes.title: Resistence

episodes.synopsis: Zyan is startled by who Santi has taken as his prisoners. Emilia finally comes face to face with Kelly Crawford, who has a proposal for her.
episodes.title: Metamorphosis

episodes.synopsis: As Emilia squares off against Kelly, she is surprised by María's reaction to the drug-trafficking queen. Ana readies herself for battle.
episodes.title: Hope
